00011 #ifndef _FM_COLOR_H_

00020 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FMColor
00021 {
00022 public:
00023     uint8 r;    
00024     uint8 g;    
00025     uint8 b;    
00026     uint8 a;    
00030     FMColor() {}
00031 
00040     FMColor(uint8 _r, uint8 _g, uint8 _b, uint8 _a = 255) { r = _r; g = _g; b = _b; a = _a; }
00041 
00047     FMColor(uint32 hex) { r = uint8((hex & 0xFF000000) >> 24); g = uint8((hex & 0xFF0000) >> 16); b = uint8((hex & 0xFF00) >> 8); a = uint8(hex & 0xFF); }
00048 
00059     FMColor(const float* components, uint32 componentCount);
00060 
00064     FMColor(const FMVector3& v);
00065 
00068     FMColor(const FMVector4& v);
00069 
00075     void ToFloats(float* components, uint32 componentCount);
00076 
00079     inline uint8 ComponentAverage() { return uint8((uint32(r) + uint32(g) + uint32(b)) / 3); }
00080 
00083     operator uint8*() { return &b; }
00084 };
00085 
00090 inline FMColor operator*(float s, const FMColor& c) { return FMColor(uint8(c.r * s), uint8(c.g * s), uint8(c.b * s), uint8(c.a * s)); }
00091 
00092 #endif // _FM_COLOR_H_
